Class Mover

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Mover

public class Mover
extends greenfoot.Actor

Mover. This is the base class for all moving objects. In addition to the standard Actor methods, it provides the ability to move and turn.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Pieter Herinckx

public void remove(java.lang.Class clss)
